Reviews.Title: Looks Real!!
Reviews.Author: CHIUYUEH HUANG
Reviews.Content: Received products ahead of time. The quality is OK but looks like a real camera. Flash red light every second. If it comes with motion detector and lights on when motion detected, it will be perfect. I will recommend my friends buy one. Will install it and see if it is working.

ProductInfo.Features:
Continuous flashing light and fake IR LEDs
This camera can be mounted to the wall or ceiling
Economical way to deter vandalism, theft and robberies
Staff & thieves will never know it is a dummy
Power requires: 2 x AA batteries (Not Included)
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 2 x Dummy Dome Security Cameras Fake IR LED Simulated Home CCTV Surveillance with Flashing Light C3B
